name: Kyle vs. The Universe
description:
A run and gun in the distant future.

When Kyle's home planet falls into chaos, his father informs him he is the only one who can save the day. In a two dimensional world, there are gods above him he cannot begin to comprehend, who can change the dynamics of his universe by simply thinking about it.

Featuring two platforming levels and two full boss battles, as well as controller support

Created using Godot and Aseprite
